name: speech-single-prop

  model_name: test-model
  voice: "nova"
  speed: 1.0
  output_format: "mp3"
test_settings:
  props:
    userMessage: "This is a test message from props"
---

Please read this text aloud.
</System>

<SpeechPrompt>
{props.userMessage}
</SpeechPrompt>
